channel.title: Inside MageMail
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was kind of inspired by Rob Walling's startup documentary and also have been getting a little addicted to podcasting as me and a buddy started one in our niche a couple months ago.
So I setup a tag on my blog called "Inside MageMail" and I've started putting quick audio clips up: http://kalenjordan.com/tagged/insidemagemail
There's also a podcast RSS feed that you can subscribe to.
Basically the plan is to talk about startup life / bootstrapping topics and whatever random ideas come to mind from time to time :smile:
This isn't a business opportunity type thing - just kind of a way to vent some of the ideas I have from time to time, and maybe if there are one or two people that could benefit from it, that's cool as well.
Not really looking for critiques per se, but any feedback / discussion around the topics mentioned in there would be welcome. :smile:

item.title: Inside MageMail
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Hey guys, I was kind of inspired by Rob Walling’s startup documentary and also have been getting a little addicted to podcasting as me and a buddy started one in our niche a couple months ago.

So I setup a tag on my blog called “Inside MageMail” and I’ve started putting quick audio clips up:
http://kalenjordan.com/tagged/insidemagemail

There’s also a podcast RSS feed that you can subscribe to.

Basically the plan is to talk about startup life / bootstrapping topics and whatever random ideas come to mind from time to time

This isn’t a business opportunity type thing - just kind of a way to vent some of the ideas I have from time to time, and maybe if there are one or two people that could benefit from it, that’s cool as well.

Not really looking for critiques per se, but any feedback / discussion around the topics mentioned in there would be welcome.
